system.availability: Applied to the skin, it softens it to the consistency of soft waxe for ~5 minutes, allowing it to be reshaped. Multiple applications allows for the flesh beneath to be reshaped, although this is painful. Others have -30 to perception tests to determine user's true identity, lasts 1d5 days. Poor only provides -10, Good lasts 1-10 days as desired.
system.cost: Taking more than one dose within 24 hours forces a cumulative -10 Toughness Test. If failing, drug does nothing and further doses also do nothing for next 24 hours.
